name: Tomorrow's potato farmer
description:
Tomorrow's potato farmer is a simulator game set in a world not to distant from our own where farming communities are more important than ever. Players take on the role of a farmer-turned-warrior, leading their potato farm to victory in a battle against rival countries. The game features resource collecting with a variety of tools as the main mechanic and is set in a small but beautiful world with a variety of farms adding to the immersive experience. As the player progresses, they will encounter enemies that want to take control of the farm by eliminating you. The ultimate goal of the game is to become the hero farmer the world deserves!

Ask yourself what role farmers play today in our modern life and what role they will have tomorrow.
